document_data.mainbody:
Niofu Sangto was a hero of Koryo.
Niofu Sangto defeated the Kozakuran navy in the Battle of Wui Eyong in the year Koryo 812 and possessed the sitting dog, a magical chalice of uncertain powers, and was the last known have to used it. Niofu Sangto also owned a fortress that stood on the coast somewhere to the east of the city of Tu Pe. Both the fortress and the dog were lost before 1357 DR.The date "Koryo 812" is unknown in familiar calendar systems.
